titleInfo.title: Letter from Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushere [Bushire], to Peter Elwin Wrench, East India Company Agent at Basra

mods.abstract: The letter is mainly a defence against accusations of neglect and impropriety made by the Agent at Basra regarding the relaying of news, use of express boats, and the employment of Lewis Baretto D'Souza, a former writer at Basra accused of spying for the Turks. Also contains a report on the security at Bushire and an update on the movements of Carem Khaun's [Karim Khan] men and the state of negotiations with him.
